name: Once in a Blue Moon V4

metadata.name: Blink
metadata.description:
Blink
I begin with a poem I composed about this piece;

Long before the great shift of reality was set in motion, long before the substance of life was abandoned by the gravity of grace.

The weight of the heavens was turned into tears and silence like stardust fell from her face.

Though we think we can see life coming and believe we can predict the future with analysis and statistics, we are always surprised at what happens in the blink of an eye.  Painting is just that for me.  I never know where I am going until I get there, and there it happens in a blink of an eye.
